author: cnbc.com
title: Dime Community Bancshares to Release Earnings on April 26, 2018
text:
BROOKLYN, N.Y., April 10, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Dime Community Bancshares, Inc. (Nasdaq:DCOM) (the "Company") today announced that the Company expects to release its earnings for the quarter ended March 31, 2018 after the closing of the U.S. equity markets on Thursday, April 26, 2018.
ABOUT DIME COMMUNITY BANCSHARES, INC.
The Company had $6.40 billion in consolidated assets as of December 31, 2017 and is the parent company of Dime Community Bank (the “bank”). The bank was founded in 1864, is headquartered in Brooklyn, New York, and currently has twenty-nine branches located throughout Brooklyn, Queens, the Bronx, Nassau County and Suffolk County, New York. More information on the Company and the bank can be found on Dime's website at www.dime.com .
Contact: Avinash Reddy, Senior Vice President – Corporate Development and Treasurer, 718-782-6200, extension 5909.
Source:Dime Community Bancshares, Inc.
